metadata.name: Suspicious Reg Add BitLocker
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious addition to BitLocker related registry keys via the reg.exe utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\software\\policies\\microsoft\\fve')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/v')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/f')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('enablebdewithnotpm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('useadvancedstartup')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('usetpm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('usetpmkey')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('usetpmkeypin')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('recoverykeymessagesource')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('usetpmpin')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('recoverykeymessage'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious addition to BitLocker related registry keys via the reg.exe utility
